aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by actions based on the presence of tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by actions based on tag key-value pairs attached to the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by actions based on the presence of tag keys in the request

securityhub:ASFFSyntaxPath/${ASFFSyntaxP.description: Filters access by the specified fields and values in the request

securityhub:TargetAccount.description: Filters access by the AwsAccountId field that is specified in the request
